subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The win Wednesday night by the Cardinals ended an ill-timed seven-game losing streak that had seen their once-commanding lead over the Astros in the N.L. Central Division shrink to one and a half games.
snippet: The win Wednesday night by the Cardinals ended an ill-timed seven-game losing streak that had seen their once-commanding lead over the Astros in the N.L. Central Division shrink to one and a half games.
